key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities, particularly reliance on semiconductors and electronic components
Dependence on the automotive sector, making it vulnerable to cyclical downturns and shifts in consumer demand
Operational inefficiencies leading to delays and higher costs
Intense competition from larger EMS providers and automotive suppliers
controversies: Securities fraud allegations in a class action lawsuit regarding misleading statements about financial health and operational capabilities
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability initiatives, including energy-efficient LED lighting solutions and reducing environmental footprint
social_issues: Employee retention challenges during the COVID-19 pandemic
governance_issues: Leadership changes, including the appointment of a new Chief Financial Officer
